attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the Public
attributes.additional_details: There are enough local events that have these,No need to have them in someones back garden. which means potentialy they explode yards away from the neighbours pets,They scar our pets for life and have been known to even kill them.i know these debates keep coming and going ,but the fireworks are getting louder and nothing gets done.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
